description.p: This addon adds an integration to the iParapheur application.
iParapheur from Adullact is a system that let users sign document with certificates stored into their browser.

This package will add new a new Service that exposes Web Services of iParapheur and offer a default template to set the security files need to establish connection with the iParapheur Server. Each Method exposed by the service is also exposed as Operation Automation. And Finally the MP contains also a Seam component that returned the histogramme of a "Dossier" stored into iParapheur mapped to the currentDocument. Histogramme objects are exposed as List of PageSelection of DocumentModel that lets you create a Table View in studio to expose it as your wish. The Dossier itself metadata stored into iParapheur is also expose into this Seam Component as "adullactDossier". If you want to know more, please look into the code well documented, see it in http://github.com/nuxeo
